analyzed: ācārya dharmakīrti viracitā sambandha parīkṣā

original: nanu cāṇū nāmayaḥśalākākalpatvenānyonyaṃ sambandhābhāvataḥ sthūlādipratīterbhrāntatvāt kathaṃ tadvaśāt tatsvabhāvo bhāvaḥ syāt?
analyzed: nanu ca aṇū na amayaḥ śalākā kalpa tvena anyonyam sambandha abhāvataḥ sthūla ādi pratīteḥ bhrānta tvāt katham tad vaśāt tad svabhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ syāt

original: tathā hi - sambandho 'rthānāṃ pāratantryalakṣaṇo vā syāt,
analyzed: tathā hi sambandhaḥ rthānām pāratantrya lakṣaṇaḥ vā syāt
rūpa śleṣa lakṣaṇaḥ vā syāt
prathama pakṣe kim asau niṣpannayoḥ sambandhinoḥ syāt
a niṣpannayoḥ vā
na tāvat aniṣpannayoḥ
sva rūpasya eva asattvāt śaśa aśva viṣāṇa vat
niṣpannayoḥ ca pāratantrya abhāvāt asambandhaḥ eva
uktam ca

original: pāratantryaṃ hi sambandhaḥ siddhe kā paratantratā /
analyzed: pāratantryam hi sambandhaḥ siddhe kā paratantra tā

original: tasmāt sarvasya bhāvasya sambandho nāsti tattvataḥ // 1 //
analyzed: tasmāt sarvasya bhāvasya sambandhaḥ na asti tattvataḥ
na api rūpa śleṣa lakṣaṇaḥ sau
sambandhinoḥ dvi tve rūpa śleṣa virodhāt
tayoḥ aikye vā sutarām sambandha abhāvaḥ
sambandhinoḥ abhāve sambandha ayogāt
dviṣṭha tvāt tasya
atha nairantaryam tayoḥ rūpa śleṣaḥ
na asya antarāla bhāva rūpa tvena a tāttvika tvāt sambandha rūpa tva ayogaḥ

original: nirantaratāyāśca sambandharūpatve sāntaratāpi kathaṃ sambandho na syāt?
analyzed: nirantara tāyāḥ ca sambandha rūpa tve sāntara tā api katham sambandhaḥ na syāt
kiñca asau rūpa śleṣaḥ sarvātmanā
eka deśena vā syāt

original: sarvātmanā rūpaśleṣe aṇūnāṃ piṇḍaḥ aṇumātraḥ syāt /
analyzed: sarva ātmanā rūpa śleṣe aṇūnām piṇḍaḥ aṇu mātraḥ syāt
eka deśena tad śaleṣe kim ekadeśāḥ tasya ātma bhūtāḥ
para bhūtāḥ vā
ātma bhūtāḥ ced
na eka deśena rūpa śleṣaḥ tad abhāvāt
para bhūtāḥ ced

original: tairapyaṇūnāṃ sarvātmanaikadeśena vā rūpaśleṣe sa eva paryanuyogaḥ,
analyzed: taiḥ api aṇūnām sarva ātmanā eka deśena vā rūpa śleṣe saḥ eva paryanuyogaḥ
anavasthā ca syāt tat uktam

original: rūpaśleṣo hi sambadho dvitve sa ca kathaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: rūpa śleṣaḥ hi dvi tve sa ca katham bhavet
tasmāt prakṛti bhinnānām sambandhaḥ na asti tattvataḥ
kiñca para apakṣā eva sambandhaḥ
tasya dviṣṭha tvāt

original: taṃ cāpekṣate bhāvaḥ svayaṃ san, asan vā?
analyzed: tam ca apekṣate bhāvaḥ svayam san asan vā
na tāvat asan
apekṣā dharma āśraya tva virodhāt khara śṛṅga vat
na api san sarva nirāśaṃsa tvāt
anyathā sattva virodhāt

original: tanna parāpekṣā nāma yadrūpaḥ sambandhaḥ siddhyet /
analyzed: tat na para apekṣā nāma yad rūpaḥ sambandhaḥ siddhyet
uktam ca
para apekṣā hi sambandhaḥ saḥ san katham apekṣate
san ca sarva nirāśaṃsaḥ bhāvaḥ katham apekṣate

original: kiñca- asau sambandhaḥ sambandhibhyāṃ bhinnaḥ, abhinno vā?
analyzed: kiñca asau sambandhaḥ sambandhibhyām bhinnaḥ abhinnaḥ vā
yadi abhinnaḥ
tadā sambandhinau eva
na sambandhaḥ kaścid
saḥ eva vā na tau iti
bhinnaḥ ced
sambandhinau kevalau katham sambaddhau syātām
bhavatu vā sambandhaḥ ṛtha antaram

original: tathāpi tenaikena sambandhena saha dvayoḥ sambandhinoḥ kaḥ sambandhaḥ?
analyzed: tathā api tena ekena sambandhena saha dvayoḥ sambandhinoḥ kaḥ sambandhaḥ
yathā sambandhinoḥ yathā ukta doṣāt na kaścid sambandhaḥ
tathā atra api
tena anayoḥ sambandha antara abhyupagame ca anavasthā syāt
tatra api sambandha antara anuṣaṅgāt
tat na sambandhinoḥ sambandha buddhiḥ vāstavī
tava di atirekeṇa anyasya sambandhasya asambhavāt tat uktam
dvayoḥ eka abhisambandhāt sambandhaḥ yadi tat dvayoḥ
kaḥ sambandhaḥ navasthā ca na sambandha matiḥ tathā
tatas

original: tau ca bhāvau tadanyaśca sarve te svātmani sthitāḥ /
analyzed: tau ca bhāvau tad anyaḥ ca sarve te sva ātmani sthitāḥ
iti amiśrāḥ svayam bhāvāḥ tān miśrayati kalpanā

original: tau ca bhāvau sambandhinau tābhyāmanyaśca sambandhaḥ,
analyzed: tau ca bhāvau sambandhinau tābhyām anyaḥ ca sambandhaḥ
sarve te sva ātmani sva svarūpe sthitāḥ
tena amiśrāḥ vyāvṛtta svarūpāḥ svayam bhāvāḥ
tathā api tān miśrayati yojayati kalpanā
atas eva tad vāstava sambandha abhāve pi tām eva kalpanām anurundhānaiḥ vyavahartṛbhiḥ bhāvānām bhedaḥ nyāpohaḥ

original: tasya pratyāyanāya kriyākārakādivācinaḥ śabdāḥ prayojyante- 'devadatta gāmabhyāja śuklāṃ daṇḍena ityādayaḥ /
analyzed: tasya pratyāyanāya kriyā kāraka ādi vācinaḥ śabdāḥ prayojyante devadatta gām abhyāja śuklām daṇḍena ityādayaḥ
na khalu kārakāṇām kriyayā sambandhaḥ sti
kṣaṇika tvena kriyā kāle kārakāṇām asambhavāt uktam ca
tām eva ca anurundhānaiḥ kriyā kāraka vācinaḥ
bhāva bheda pratīti artham saṃyojyante bhidhāyakāḥ
kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ api tayoḥ asahabhāvataḥ
prasiddhi ati katham dviṣṭhaḥ dviṣṭhe sambandha tā katham
kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ tarhi bhaviṣyati iti api asamīcīnam
kārya kāraṇayoḥ asahabhāvataḥ tasya api dviṣṭhasya asambhavāt

original: na khalu kāraṇakāle kāryaṃ tatkāle vā kāraṇamasti,
analyzed: na khalu kāraṇa kāle kāryam tad kāle vā kāraṇam asti
tulya kālam kārya kāraṇa bhāva anupapatteḥ
savyetara go viṣāṇa vat

original: tanna sambandhinau sahabhāvinau vidyete yeṃnānayorvartamāno 'sau sambandhaḥ syāt /
analyzed: tat na sambandhinau sahabhāvinau vidyete sau sambandhaḥ syāt
a dviṣṭhe ca bhāve sambandha tā anupapannā eva
krameṇa bhāvaḥ ekatra varttamānaḥ nyanispṛhaḥ
tad bhāve pi tad bhāvāt sambandhaḥ na eka vṛttimān

original: kārye kāraṇe vā krameṇāsau sambandho vartate- ityapyasāmpratam;
analyzed: kārye kāraṇe vā krameṇa asau sambandhaḥ vartate iti api asāmpratam

original: yataḥ krameṇāpi bhāvaḥ sambandhākhya ekatra kāraṇe kārye vā varttamāno 'nyanispṛhaḥ kāryakāraṇayoranyatarānapekṣo naikavṛttimān sambandho yuktaḥ;
analyzed: yatas krameṇa api bhāvaḥ sambandha ākhyaḥ ekatra kāraṇe kārye vā varttamānaḥ kārya kāraṇayoḥ anyatara anapekṣaḥ na eka vṛttimān sambandhaḥ yuktaḥ
tad abhāve api kārya kāraṇayoḥ abhāve pi tad bhāvāt
yadi apekṣya tayoḥ ekam anyatra asau pravartate
upakārī hi apekṣyaḥ syāt katham ca upakaroti asan

original: yadi punaḥ kāryakāraṇayorekaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ vāpekṣyānyatra kārye kāraṇe vāsau sambandhaḥ krameṇa varttata iti saspṛhatvena dviṣṭha eveṣyate;
analyzed: yadi punar kārya kāraṇayoḥ ekam kāryam kāraṇam vā apekṣya anyatra kārye kāraṇe vā asau sambandhaḥ krameṇa varttate iti sa spṛhā tvena dviṣṭhaḥ evā iṣyate
tadā anena apekṣyamāṇena upakāriṇā bhavitavyam
yasmāt upakārī apekṣyaḥ syāt na anyaḥ
katham ca upakaroti asan

original: yadā kāraṇakāle kāryākhyo bhāvo 'san tatkāle vā kāraṇākhyastadā naivopakuryād;
analyzed: yadā kāraṇa kāle kārya ākhyaḥ san tad kāle vā kāraṇa ākhyaḥ tadā na eva upakuryāt
a sāmarthyāt
yadi eka artha abhisambandhāt kārya kāraṇa tā tayoḥ
prāptāḥ dvi tva ādi sambandhāt savyetara viṣāṇayoḥ
kiñca yadi ekārtha abhisambandhāt kārya kāraṇa tā tayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva tvena abhimatayoḥ
tarhi dvitva saṃkhyā paratva aparatva vibhāga ādi sambandhāt prāptā sā savyetara go viṣāṇayoḥ api

original: dviṣṭho hi kaścit sambandho nāto 'nyattasya lakṣaṇam /
analyzed: dviṣṭhaḥ hi kaścid sambandhaḥ na atas nyattasya lakṣaṇam
bhāva abhāva upadhiḥ yogaḥ kārya kāraṇa tā yadi

original: na yena kenacidekena sambandhāt seṣyate; kiṃ tarhi?
analyzed: na yena kenacid ekena sambandhāt seṣyate kim tarhi
sambandha lakṣaṇena evā iti ced tat na
dviṣṭhaḥ hi kaścid padārthaḥ sambandhaḥ
na atas rtha dvaya abhisambandhāt anyat tasya lakṣaṇam
yena asya saṃkhyā ādeḥ viśeṣaḥ vyavasthāpyeta
na tau eva karya kāraṇatā atra kim
bhedāt ced nanu ayam śabdaḥ niyoktāram samāśritaḥ
kasyacid bhāve bhāvaḥ bhāve ca abhāvaḥ

original: tāvupādhī viśeṣaṇaṃ yasya yogasya=sambandhasya sa kāryakāraṇatā yadi na sarvasambandhaḥ;
analyzed: tau upādhī viśeṣaṇam yasya yogasya asambandhasya sa kārya kāraṇatā yadi na sarva sambandhaḥ
tadā tau eva yoga upādhī bhāva abhāvau kārya kāraṇatā astu
kim asat sambandha kalpanayā

original: bhedāccet 'bhāve hi bhāvo 'bhāve cābhāvaḥ' iti bahavo 'bhidheyāḥ kathaṃ kāryakāraṇatetyekārthābhidhāyinā śabdenocyante?
analyzed: bhedāt ced bhāve hi bhāvaḥ bhāve ca abhāvaḥ iti bahavaḥ bhidheyāḥ katham kārya kāraṇa tā iti ekārtha abhidhāyinā śabdena ucyante
nanu ayam śabdaḥ niyoktāram samāśritaḥ

original: niyoktā hi yaṃ śabdaṃ yathā prayuṅkte tathā prāha,
analyzed: niyoktā hi yam śabdam yathā prayuṅkte tathā prāha

original: ityanekatrāpyekā śrutirna virudhyate iti tāveva kāryakāraṇatā // 12 //
analyzed: iti anekatra api ekā śrutiḥ na virudhyate iti tau eva kārya kāraṇatā
paśyan eka m adṛṣṭasya darśane tad adarśane
apaśyat kāryam anveti vinā vyākhyātṛbhiḥ janaḥ
yasmāt paśyan ekam kāraṇa abhimatam upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya adṛṣṭasya kārya ākhyasya darśane

original: sati tadadarśane ca satyapaśyatkāryamanveti 'idamato bhavati' iti pratipadyate janaḥ
analyzed: sati tad adarśane ca sati a paśyat kāryam anveti idam atas bhavati iti pratipadyate janaḥ
atas idam jātam iti ākhyātṛbhiḥ vinā api
darśana adarśane muktvā kārya buddheḥ asambhavāt
kārya ādi śrutiḥ api atra lāghava artha niveśitā

original: tasmād darśanādarśane viṣayiṇi viṣayopacārāt- bhāvābhāvau muktvā kāryabuddherasambhavāt
analyzed: tasmāt darśana adarśane viṣayiṇi viṣaya upacārāt bhāva abhāvau muktvā kārya buddheḥ asambhavāt
kārya ādi śrutiḥ api atra bhāva abhāvayoḥ mā lokaḥ pratipadam iyatīm śabda mālām abhidadhyāt
iti vyavahāra lāghava artham niveśitā iti
tad bhāva abhāvāt tad kārya gatiḥ yā api anuvarṇyate
saṅketa viṣaya ākhyā sā sāsnādeḥ go gatiḥ yathā

original: anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ kāryakāraṇatā nānyā cet kathaṃ bhāvābhāvābhyāṃ sā prasādhyate?
analyzed: anvaya vyatirekābhyām kārya kāraṇatā na anyā ced katham bhāva abhāvābhyām sā prasādhyate

original: tadabhāvābhāvāt liṅgāt tatkāryatāgatiryāpyanuvarṇyate- 'asyedaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca' iti;
analyzed: tad abhāva abhāvāt liṅgāt tad kārya tā gatiḥ yā api anuvarṇyate asya idam kāryam kāraṇam ca iti
saṅketa viṣaya ākhyā sā

original: yathā 'gaurayaṃ sāsnādimattvāt' ityanena govyavahārasya viṣayaḥ pradarśyate // 15 //
analyzed: yathā gauḥ ayam sāsnādimat tvāt iti anena go vyavahārasya viṣayaḥ pradarśyate

original: bhāve bhāvini tadbhāvo bhāva eva ca bhāvitā /
analyzed: bhāve bhāvini tad bhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ eva ca bhāvi tā
prasiddhe hetu phala te pratyakṣa anupalambhataḥ

original: yataśca 'bhāve bhāvini=bhavanadharmiṇi tadbhāvaḥ=kāraṇābhimatasya bhāva eva kāraṇatvam,
analyzed: yatas ca bhāve bhāvi nibhavana dharmiṇi tad bhāvaḥ kāraṇa abhimatasya bhāvaḥ eva kāraṇa tvam

original: bhāve eva kāraṇābhimatasya bhāvitā kāryābhimatasya kāryatvam' iti prasiddhe pratyakṣānupalambhato hetuphalate /
analyzed: bhāve eva kāraṇa abhimatasya bhāvi tā kārya abhimatasya kārya tvam iti prasiddhe pratyakṣa anupalambhataḥ hetu phala te
tatas bhāva abhāvau eva kārya kāraṇa tā na anyā
etāvat mātra tattva arthāḥ kārya kāraṇa gocarāḥ
vikalpāḥ darśayanti arthān mithyā arthāḥ ghaṭitān iva
tena etāvat mātraṃbhāva abhāvau tau eva tattvam yasya arthasya asau etāvat mātra tattvaḥ

original: so 'rtho yeṣāṃ vikalpānāṃ te etāvanmātratattvārthāḥ=etāvanmātrabījāḥ kāryakāraṇagocarāḥ,
analyzed: saḥ rthaḥ yeṣām vikalpānām te etāvat mātra tattva arthāḥ etāvat mātra bījāḥ kārya kāraṇa gocarāḥ
darśayanti ghaṭitān iva a sambaddha a niva a sambaddhān api arthān
evam ghaṭanāt ca mithyā arthāḥ
bhinne kā ghaṭana abhinne kārya kāraṇatā api kā

original: bhāvehyanyasya viśliṣṭau śliṣṭau syātāṃ kathaṃ ca tau // 18 //
analyzed: viśliṣṭau śliṣṭau syātām katham ca tau
kiñca asau kārya kāraṇa bhūtaḥ rthaḥ bhinnaḥ
a bhinnaḥ vā syāt
yadi bhinnaḥ
tarhi bhinne kā ghaṭanā sva svabhāva vyavasthiteḥ
atha abhinnaḥ
tadā abhinne kārya kāraṇatā api kā nā eva syāt
syāt etat na bhinnasya abhinnasya vā sambandhaḥ
kim tarhi sambandha ākhyena ekena sambandhāt

original: ityatrāpi bhāve sattāyāmanyasya sambandhasya viśliṣṭau kāryakāraṇābhimatau śliṣṭau syātām,
analyzed: iti atra api bhāve sattāyām anyasya sambandhasya viśliṣṭau kārya kāraṇa abhimatau śliṣṭau syātām
katham ca tau saṃyogi samavāyinau
ādi grahaṇāt sva svāmi ādikam
saṃyogi samavāyi ādi sarvam etena cintitam
anyonya anupakārāt ca na sambandhī ca tādṛśaḥ

original: sarvametenāntantaroktena sāmānyasambandhapratiṣedhena cintitam saṃyogyādīnāmanyonyamanupakārāccājanyajanakabhāvācca na sambandhī ca tādṛśo
analyzed: sarvam etena anta antara uktena sāmānya sambandha pratiṣedhena cintitam saṃyogi ādīnām anyonyam anupakārāt ca ajanya janaka bhāvāt ca na sambandhī ca
janane pi hi kāryasya kenacid samavāyinā
samavāyī tadā na asau na tiprasaṅgataḥ

original: athāsti kaścit samavāyī yo 'vayavirūpaṃ kāryaṃ janayati,
analyzed: atha asti kaścid samavāyī yaḥ vayavi rūpam kāryam janayati
atas na anupakārāt asambandhi tā iti
tat na

original: yato janane 'pi kāryasya kenacit samavāyinābhyupagamyamāne samavāyī,
analyzed: yatas janane pi kāryasya kenacid samavāyinā abhyupagamyamāne samavāyī
na asau tadā janana kāle kāryasya aniṣpatteḥ

original: na ca tato jananāt samavāyitvaṃ siddhyati;
analyzed: na ca tatas jananāt samavāyi tvam siddhi ati
kumbhakāra ādeḥ api ghaṭe samavāyi tva prasaṅgāt
tayoḥ anupakāre samavāye paratra vā

original: sambandho yadi viśvaṃ syāt samavāyi parasparam // 21 //
analyzed: sambandhaḥ yadi viśvam syāt samavāyi parasparam

original: tayoḥ samavāyinoḥ parasparamanupakāre 'pi tābhyāṃ vā samavāyasya nityatayā samavāyena vā tayoḥ paratra vā kvacidanupakāre 'pi sambandho yadīṣyate;
analyzed: tayoḥ samavāyinoḥ parasparam anupakāre tābhyām vā samavāyasya nitya tayā samavāyena vā tayoḥ paratra vā kvacid anupakāre sambandhaḥ yadi iṣyate

original: tadā viśvaṃ parasparāsambaddhaṃ samavāyi parasparaṃ syāt // 21 //
analyzed: tadā viśvam paraspara asambaddham samavāyi parasparam syāt
saṃyoga janane piṣṭau tatas saṃyoginau na tau
karma ādi yogi tā āpatteḥ sthitiḥ ca prativarṇitā
iti ācārya dharmakīrti viracitā sambandha parīkṣā samāptā

original: yadi ca saṃyogasya kāryatvāttasya tābhyāṃ jananāt saṃyogitā tayoḥ tadā saṃyogajanane 'piṣṭau,
analyzed: yadi ca saṃyogasya kārya tvāt tasya tābhyām jananāt saṃyogi tā tayoḥ tadā saṃyoga janane piṣṭau
tatas saṃyoga jananāt na tau saṃyoginau
karmaṇaḥ pi saṃyogi tā āpatteḥ
saṃyogaḥ hi anyatara karma jaḥ ubhaya karma jaḥ ca iṣyate
ādi grahaṇāt saṃyogasya api saṃyogi tā syāt
na saṃyoga jananāt saṃyogi tā kin tarhi
sthāpanāt iti ced
na sthitiḥ ca prativarṇitā grantha antare pratikṣiptā
sthāpya sthāpakayoḥ janya janaka tva abhāvāt na anyā sthitiḥ iti
iti prabhācandra kṛtā sambandha parīkṣā vyākhyā samāptā
